mapper.select: select * from kcc2022_esoom.kbl_data.code_season where season_name_2 ='1군시즌' and (#{syear} <= SUBSTRING(season_name_1,0,5) and SUBSTRING(season_name_1,0,5) <= #{eyear}) order by season_code desc

select b.kname ,b.back_num ,a.*,(a.o_r + a.d_r) r_tot from kcc2022_esoom.kbl_data.player_sum a, kcc2022_esoom.kbl_data.player b where quarter_gu ='XX' and a.season_code = b.season_code and a.player_no = b.player_no and a.game_code = '01' and b.pos in ('GD','C','FD') and b.player_flag_code_1 = '1' and b.team_code ='60' and a.season_code = #{season_code} ORDER BY CAST(b.back_num AS INT)
